Settings:

nn = 25

# Load dependencies and source data

```{r load_data, message=FALSE}

library(Matrix)
library(scran)
library(BiocParallel)
library(BiocNeighbors)
ncores = 5
mcparam = MulticoreParam(workers = ncores)
register(mcparam)
library(igraph)
library(reshape2)
library(knitr)
library(scater)
library(scales)
library(biomaRt)
library(batchelor)
library(irlba)
library(batchelor)
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)

#root.dir = "/Users/alsu/Develop/spatial/mouse_embryo/"
root.dir = "/nfs/research1/marioni/alsu/spatial/mouse_embryo/"
source(paste0(root.dir, "amScripts_mouseEmbryoFISH/core_functions.R"))

load_embryo_8.5(dir = "cluster")
sce.seq = sce[!rownames(sce) == "Xist", ]

# load atlas 
sce.atlas = readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "data/reducedAtlas/E8_25__E8_5.rds"))
sce.atlas = sce.atlas[rownames(sce.seq), sce.atlas$stage == "E8.5"]
#counts.atlas = logcounts(sce.atlas)

# order seq and atlas (in case, cant hurt, had troubles b4)
sce.seq = sce.seq[order(rownames(sce.seq)),]
sce.atlas = sce.atlas[order(rownames(sce.atlas)),]

# load mapping
mapping = readRDS(paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/mapping_seq2atlas_embryo1z2.rds"))
sce.seq = sce.seq[, colnames(sce.seq) %in% colnames(mapping)]
#counts.seq = assay(sce.seq, "logcounts_area")
meta = data.frame( colData(sce.seq))
meta.CT = readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "data/8_5/source/E8.5_treeMNN_denoised.Rds"))
colnames(meta.CT)[colnames(meta.CT) == "cell"] <- "uniqueID"
meta = merge(meta, meta.CT, all.x = T, all.y = F)


# neigh.net
neigh.net = readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "data/8_5/source/E8.5_neighbourGraph_1.3.Rds"))

```


# Get performance stat:

1) seq-binary

2) seq-cosine

3) seq-binary-denoised-1

4) seq-binary-denoised-2

5) imputed-binary-mode

6) imputed-binary-mean

7) imputed-cosine-mean

8) imputed-binary-mode-denoised-1

9) imputed-binary-mode-denoised-2

```{r imputed-stat, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

mapping = mapping[, order(colnames(mapping))]
sce.seq = sce.seq[,order(colnames(sce.seq))]
genes = rownames(sce.seq)

# seq
counts.seq = counts(sce.seq)
getBinarized = function(x){
  return(as.numeric(x >= 1))  
}
counts.binary.seq = t( apply(counts.seq, 1, function(x) getBinarized(x)) )
rownames(counts.binary.seq) = rownames(sce.seq)
colnames(counts.binary.seq) = colnames(sce.seq)
  
counts.cosine.seq = as.matrix( cosineNorm(assay(sce.seq, "logcounts_area")) )
counts.binary.seq.denoised_1 = denoisingBinaryCounts(counts.binary.seq, meta, neigh.net, 1, mcparam)
counts.binary.seq.denoised_2 = denoisingBinaryCounts(counts.binary.seq, meta, neigh.net, 1, mcparam)

# atlas
counts.atlas = counts(sce.atlas)
getBinarized = function(x){
  return(as.numeric(x >= 1))  
}
counts.binary.atlas = t( apply(counts.atlas, 1, function(x) getBinarized(x)) )
rownames(counts.binary.atlas) = rownames(sce.atlas)
colnames(counts.binary.atlas) = colnames(sce.atlas)
  
counts.cosine.atlas = as.matrix( cosineNorm(assay(sce.atlas, "logcounts")) )

n.neigh = 25
# imputed-binary-mode
counts.binary_mode.imputed = bplapply(genes, function(current.gene){
  current.atlas = counts.binary.atlas[rownames(counts.binary.atlas) == current.gene,]
  current.mapping = mapping[grepl(current.gene, rownames(mapping)),]
  mode.imputed = sapply(1:ncol(current.mapping), function(x){
    return( getmode( current.atlas[current.mapping[,x]], c(1:n.neigh) ) )
  })
  return(mode.imputed)
}, BPPARAM = mcparam)
counts.binary_mode.imputed = do.call(rbind, counts.binary_mode.imputed)
colnames(counts.binary_mode.imputed) = colnames(mapping)
rownames(counts.binary_mode.imputed) = genes

# imputed-binary-mean
counts.binary_mean.imputed = bplapply(genes, function(current.gene){
  current.atlas = counts.binary.atlas[rownames(counts.binary.atlas) == current.gene,]
  current.mapping = mapping[grepl(current.gene, rownames(mapping)),]
  mean.imputed = sapply(1:ncol(current.mapping), function(x){
    return( mean( current.atlas[current.mapping[,x]] , na.rm = T) )
  })
  return(mean.imputed)
}, BPPARAM = mcparam)
counts.binary_mean.imputed = do.call(rbind, counts.binary_mean.imputed)
colnames(counts.binary_mean.imputed) = colnames(mapping)
rownames(counts.binary_mean.imputed) = genes

# imputed-binary-mean
counts.cosine_mean.imputed = bplapply(genes, function(current.gene){
  current.atlas = counts.cosine.atlas[rownames(counts.cosine.atlas) == current.gene,]
  current.mapping = mapping[grepl(current.gene, rownames(mapping)),]
  mean.imputed = sapply(1:ncol(current.mapping), function(x){
    return( mean( current.atlas[current.mapping[,x]] , na.rm = T) )
  })
  return(mean.imputed)
}, BPPARAM = mcparam)
counts.cosine_mean.imputed = do.call(rbind, counts.cosine_mean.imputed)
colnames(counts.cosine_mean.imputed) = colnames(mapping)
rownames(counts.cosine_mean.imputed) = genes

counts.binary_mode.imputed.denoised_1 = denoisingBinaryCounts(counts.binary_mode.imputed, meta, neigh.net, 1, mcparam)
counts.binary_mode.imputed.denoised_2 = denoisingBinaryCounts(counts.binary_mode.imputed, meta, neigh.net, 2, mcparam)

# combine together
performance.seq = list(counts.binary.seq = counts.binary.seq,
                       counts.binary.seq.denoised_1 = counts.binary.seq.denoised_1,
                       counts.binary.seq.denoised_2 = counts.binary.seq.denoised_2, 
                       counts.cosine.seq = counts.cosine.seq,
                       counts.binary_mode.imputed = counts.binary_mode.imputed,
                       counts.binary_mode.imputed.denoised_1 = counts.binary_mode.imputed.denoised_1,
                       counts.binary_mode.imputed.denoised_2 = counts.binary_mode.imputed.denoised_2,
                       counts.binary_mean.imputed = counts.binary_mean.imputed,
                       counts.cosine_mean.imputed = counts.cosine_mean.imputed
                       )

saveRDS(performance.seq, file =  paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/performance_binary_seq2atlas_embryo1z2.rds"))

```
